title: On $q$-Painlev\'e VI and the geometry of Segre surfaces
abstract: arXiv:2305.17912v3 Announce Type: replace  Abstract: In the context of $q$-Painlev\'e VI with generic parameter values, the Riemann-Hilbert correspondence induces a one-to-one mapping between solutions of the nonlinear equation and points on an affine Segre surface. Upon fixing a generic point on the surface, we give formulae for the function values of the corresponding solution near the critical points, in the form of complete, convergent, asymptotic expansions. These lead in particular to the solution of the nonlinear connection problem for the general solution of $q$-Painlev\'e VI. We further show that, when the point on the Segre surface is moved to one of the sixteen lines on the surface, one of the asymptotic expansions near the critical points truncates, under suitable parameter assumptions. At intersection points of lines, this then yields doubly truncated asymptotics at one of the critical points or simultaneous truncation at both.

Title: 关于 $q$-Painlev\'e VI 和 Segre 曲面几何
摘要：arXiv:2305.17912v3 公告类型：替换 摘要：在具有一般参数值的 $q$-Painlev\'e VI 背景下，里奇-希尔伯特对应关系激发了一个非线性方程的解与一个仿射Segre 曲面上的一个点的一一对应。在曲面上的一个一般点被固定之后，我们在临近临界点的地方给出了对应的解的函数值的公式，形式是一个完整的、收敛的、渐近展开。这些展开式特别导致了 $q$-Painlev\'e VI 通解的非线性连接问题。此外，我们进一步证明，当曲面上的点移动到曲面上的16条线之一时，在临界点附近的渐近展开之一会简化，在满足某些参数假设的情况下。在曲面线的交点处，这会进一步导致在临界点之一处的双简渐近展开，或者同时在两个临界点处同时简化。
